text: A Night in the Life of Jimmy Reardon is a 1988 coming-of-age drama movie. It is also known as Aren't You Even Gonna Kiss Me Goodbye? The movie is directed and based on the novel by William Richert. Actors include River Phoenix, Ann Magnuson, Meredith Salenger, Matthew Perry, Ione Skye, Alison Goldfrapp, and Paul Kosol. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1988 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: A Night in the Life of Jimmy Reardon
